question_text: Read: Ken shared weekly progress notes so new members could understand decisions quickly. What was the purpose of the notes? (B1-SR-04)

question_text: Read: After reviewing error logs, the engineer fixed the login bug and monitored reports for three days. What happened after the fix? (B1-SR-10)

question_text: Read: The HR team introduced a mentoring program so junior staff could ask questions more easily. Why was the program introduced? (B1-SR-11)
choices: To make it easier for junior staff to ask questions.

explanation_ja: 本文の要点を根拠に最適な選択肢を判断します。

question_text: Read: Because survey responses were low, the team shortened the form and clarified each question. What change was made to improve responses? (B1-SR-12)
choices: The form was shortened and clarified.

The audience was narrowed to managers only.

question_text: Read: Lina prepared a comparison chart to explain why one supplier was more reliable despite a higher price. What did the chart explain? (B1-SR-13)

Why all suppliers should be replaced.
Why price should be ignored completely.

question_text: Read: The team recorded a short demo video so remote members could review the workflow before discussion. Why was the video recorded? (B1-SR-15)

question_text: Read: Yuta documented common customer questions and shared sample answers with the support team. What did Yuta share? (B1-SR-19)
